name: Castle Of Blunders
description:
Castle of Blunders is a small platforming game made for LowResJam 2022. The goal is to get the treasure item at the end of the dungeon and collect as many coins as possible along the way. There are 14 coins total.

Tips:

  • You can jump midair if your jump was not used before you left the ground.
  • The dash can be used repeatedly while on the ground and only once in the air before touching down.

For sounds I used SVL's RPG music pack and 200 Free SFX by Kronbits.
